outline:
1. to pierce, perforate, bore, appoint
    1. (Qal)
      1. to pierce, bore
      2. to prick off, designate
    2. (Niphal) to be pricked off, be designated, be specified
  2. (Qal) to curse, blaspheme
kjv_def: appoint, blaspheme, bore, curse, express, with holes, name, pierce, strike through.
strongs_def: to puncture, literally (to perforate, with more or less violence) or figuratively (to specify, designate, libel)
